outfit_data.top: A white silk blouse with exaggerated balloon sleeves, featuring a high neckline and a cinched waist.  The bodice is adorned with intricate black lace appliqué work in an abstract, artistic pattern.
outfit_data.bottom: Black linen wide-leg pants with a slightly cropped length, designed to flow dramatically with each step. The pants have a flattering high-waisted silhouette.
outfit_data.shoes: Sculptural red leather heels with sharp pointed toes and a unique asymmetrical platform design.
outfit_data.extras: A statement necklace featuring geometric shapes in black and silver metals adds a touch of avant-garde elegance.
